dcterms:description: A dataset of stereotypes collected through community engagement in India, containing over 2000 stereotypes across various identity axes, including gender, caste, religion, and region, aimed at enhancing evaluations of language models.
dcterms:title: SPICE (Stereotype Pooling in India with Community Engagement)
